title: Date of the contract
explanation: Date explicitly stated as 'dated as of April 2, 2020' in the contract header.

title: Party A
explanation: Party A named explicitly as 'HSBC BANK USA, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION' in the contract.

title: party_B
explanation: Party B named explicitly as 'ADVANCED ENERGY INDUSTRIES, INC.' in the contract.

title: Specified entity Party A
explanation: Text explicitly states 'Specified Entity' means none for Party A.

title: Specified entity Party B
explanation: Text explicitly states 'Specified Entity' means none for Party B.

title: Specified transaction scope
explanation: The text states that 'Specified Transaction' has the meaning specified in Section 14, indicating the standard definition as per Section 14, thus 'STD' applies.

title: Cross default applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Cross-Default' provisions of Section 5(a)(vi) will apply to Party A and Party B.

title: Specified indebtness includes borrowed_money
explanation: The text does not explicitly mention borrowed money as included or excluded in Specified Indebtedness.

title: Specified indebtness excludes deposits
explanation: The text explicitly states that Specified Indebtedness shall not include obligations in respect of deposits received in the ordinary course of a party's banking business.

title: amount for Party A
explanation: Threshold amount for Party A is expressed as a percentage, not a fixed amount.

title: currency for Party A
explanation: Currency is not fixed; it is 'or its equivalent in any other currency'.

title: percentage for Party A
explanation: Threshold amount for Party A is 3% of Party A's shareholders' equity.

title: percentage reference for Party A
explanation: Percentage reference is Party A's shareholders' equity as stated.

title: amount for Party B
explanation: Threshold amount for Party B is USD 50,000,000 as stated.

title: currency for Party B
explanation: Currency for Party B's threshold amount is USD as stated.

title: percentage for Party B
explanation: Threshold amount for Party B is a fixed amount, not a percentage.

title: percentage reference for Party B
explanation: No percentage reference for Party B as threshold is a fixed amount.

title: Credit Event Upon Merger  applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Credit Event Upon Merger' provisions apply to Party A and Party B, indicating both parties are applicable.

title: Automatic Early Termination  applicable parties
explanation: Text explicitly states that Automatic Early Termination provision will not apply to Party A and will not apply to Party B.

title: Termination Currency
explanation: The text states 'Termination Currency' means United States Dollars, which corresponds to the ISO code USD.

title: Email for notices for Party A
explanation: Email explicitly stated under Party A's address for notices.

title: Email for notices for Party B
explanation: Primary email for Party B's notices is given as chris.hanson@aei.com; other emails are copies and do not constitute notice.

title: Process agent for party A
explanation: Text states 'Party A appoints as its Process Agent: Not Applicable.' indicating no process agent for Party A.

title: Name of process agent for party A
explanation: No process agent appointed for Party A, so no name provided.

title: Address of process agent for party A
explanation: No process agent appointed for Party A, so no address provided.

title: Process agent for party B
explanation: Text states 'Party B appoints as its Process Agent: Not Applicable.' indicating no process agent for Party B.

title: Name of process agent for party B
explanation: No process agent appointed for Party B, so no name provided.

title: Address of process agent for party B
explanation: No process agent appointed for Party B, so no address provided.

title: Party A is a Multibranch party
explanation: Text explicitly states 'Party A is not a Multibranch Party.'

title: Party A offices
explanation: No offices information provided as Party A is not a Multibranch Party.

title: Party B is a Multibranch party
explanation: Text explicitly states 'Party B is not a Multibranch Party.'

title: Party B offices
explanation: No offices information provided as Party B is not a Multibranch Party.

title: Party for calculation agent
explanation: The text states that the Calculation Agent is Party A, except if an Event of Default occurs with respect to Party A, then an independent Reference Market-maker selected by Party B and approved by Party A acts as Calculation Agent temporarily. Therefore, the primary Calculation Agent is Party A.

title: Governing Law
explanation: The text explicitly states the Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of New York.
